body.description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Nourishing Body Lotion. This body lotion is specially formulated for men with dry skin. This men's body lotion is enriched with Aloe Vera, and the aloe body lotion formula boosts the moisture level in the skin and intensively moisturizes skin. NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Aloe Vera Body Lotion absorbs in seconds with no sticky or greasy feel after application, and leaves skin feeling revitalized and fresh. This NIVEA body lotion for dry skin features a 3-in-1 formula that is recommended for use as a daily body lotion, face lotion and hand lotion, and can also be used as a foot lotion. This NIVEA MEN lotion provides 24+ hours of moisturization and it's ideal for use all year round. A moisturizing body lotion is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Body Wash. To use this body lotion pump, smooth body moisturizer over body, face or hands; apply dry skin body lotion daily after showering for best results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phenomenal Moisture & Smell!
reviews.reviewText: I've always been a fan of Nivea but I love this one. I make care baskets yearly for my father, my son, nephews, brother- in - law ect. I'm always looking for good smelling long lasting lotions and colognes the guys would like. This is the best I've come across in a long time. It's deeply moisturizing and gives soft skin without being sticky or taking to long to sink in. It helps moisturize deep into the skin and has helped family members with dry elbows, knees and rough patches. It makes their skin so soft and smells so good that I've tried to sneak a bit of my sons lol. The smell isn't too strong but enough to be noticeable. It has a clean manly scent that's not cheap or outdated. They said they absolutely love it and want me to keep it as a staple in the baskets from now on. It's a win! Would I buy again? Yes, I now have a subscription. Would I recommend it? Absolutely, it does everything it needs to and more for a nice price point. 5 Stars!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Good Everyday Moisturizer For Men
reviews.reviewText: I was in the market for a new moisturizer and I'm glad I stumbled upon this one. Being a typical guy that likes combo deals, I liked that this Nivea Moisturizer is a 3 In One : hands, face and body all in one.Unlike my girlfriend who has a different moisturizer for practically every part of her body and whose bathroom counter is cluttered with bottles and bottles of different types of moisturizer while my side has literally one bottle of this Nivea Moisturizer on it.And this Nivea works really well and goes on easily with just a little bit without leaving my face feeling greasy or looking shiny like some other moisturizers I've used before. And it says it last 24 hours and I would say that's a pretty good guesstimate on Nivea's part.
